author: Alex Lockie
description: Kim Jong Nam arrived in Malaysia on the same day as "a middle-aged Korea-American based in Bangkok," an Asian news outlet reports.
title: Kim Jong Un's brother reportedly met with a US agent before he was killed — and it could have been a coup

author: By Ekin Karasin For Mailonline
description: CCTV purports to shows the 45-year-old with a Korean-American man suspected to be a spy in a hotel lift at the resort island of Langkawi in northern Malaysia on February 9.
title: Kim Jong-nam poisoned ‘four days after meeting an American spy'
